verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14678'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: Скажи: "Ищу спасенья я у Господа рассвета

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14679'>ن ش</tajweed>َرِّ مَا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ق</tajweed>َ
verses.translation: От зла того, что Он создал

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14680'>ن ش</tajweed>َرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>َ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa min syarri gāsiqin iżā waqab(a).

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14680'>ن ش</tajweed>َرِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14681'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َفَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ثَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14682'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعُقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ِ
verses.translation: От зла того, кто колдовство творит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':14680'>ن ش</tajweed>َرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>َ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa min syarri ḥāsidin iżā ḥasad(a).
verses.translation: От зла завистника, Когда в нем зависть зреет
